標題： 圖書館論文系統恢復使用 The library's e-thesis/dissertations system is working
日期： Wed, 7 Aug 2024 19:24:38 +0800

圖書館論文系統已經恢復連線，請畢業研究生登入建檔上傳論文，謝謝您的配合。
論文系統 https://etd.ndhu.edu.tw

The library's e-thesis/dissertations system has been repaired. Graduate students please go to the system to upload your theses/dissertation. 
Thank you for your cooperation.
The library's e-thesis/dissertations system  https://etd.ndhu.edu.tw
